article.headline: Harvard 83, Lehigh 75
article.story: BOSTON (AP) -- Brian Cusworth scored 20 points and grabbed seven rebounds, Drew Housman contributed 18 points and Harvard held off a determined second-half effort to beat Lehigh 83-75 Saturday. Lehigh (2-5) was paced by Jose Olivero, who scored 15 points. Jason Mgebroff scored 13, Phil Anderson added 11 and Zahir Carrington scored 10 points and led both teams with eight rebounds. Brian Unger scored 11 points and Andrew Pusar 10 for Harvard (2-3). The Crimson outrebounded Lehigh 37-33 and forced 14 turnovers that led to 21 points. Lehigh also was outscored 25-11 from the free-throw line. The Crimson built a 41-22 halftime lead behind 10 points from Housman and nine Mountain Hawk turnovers that led to 15 Harvard points. But Lehigh caught fire in the opening minutes of the second half behind a 15-4 run. Lehigh cut Crimson's lead to 49-43 when Greg Page made a 3-point shot with 14:52 remaining. Harvard answered with a 21-9 run of its own, ending with a 70-52 lead on Evan Harris' two free throws with 8:15 left in the game. Lehigh trimmed the lead to 72-66 on a jump shot by Anderson with 2:57 remaining. But Harvard held the Mountain Hawks to nine points in the closing minutes, while making nine straight free throws.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
